snippet: Two new wildfires erupted today, chasing residents from homes in the latest in a series of blazes that have destroyed more than 100 homes.    Nearly 40,000 acres were turned to ash in the week-old series of wind-driven Southern California fires....
lead_paragraph: Two new wildfires erupted today, chasing residents from homes in the latest in a series of blazes that have destroyed more than 100 homes. Nearly 40,000 acres were turned to ash in the week-old series of wind-driven Southern California fires.
abstract: Two new wildfires erupted in San Bernardino and Riverside counties north of Los Angeles, chasing residents from homes (S)

headline.main: 2 New, Wind-Driven Fires Erupt In Besieged Southern California
